item.title: Implementing SHA1 from scratch in Rust
item.description: In this article we’re taking a closer look at the Base64 algorithm and implement an encoder and decoder from scratch using the Rust programming language. Base64 is quite an easy to grasp algorithm and certainly fun to implement yourself! Let’s dive right in! What is Base64? Base64 is an encoding algorithm that was primarily designed to encode binary data for use in text-based algorithms by using 64 different ASCII characters to represent the bits.
